metadata.feature_description: View and manage system-generated URLs with sorting and filtering capabilities

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and select a page
steps.expected: Page list should load with all available pages
steps.actual: Page list loaded successfully showing 22 pages including Home, Our Products, Test Page One, etc.

steps.action: Open Advanced > S.E.O. tab to view URLs for the page
steps.expected: URLs for the selected page should be displayed
steps.actual: URLs displayed in a table showing URL path, URL Type, and Generated By columns. System-generated URLs marked as 'Automatic' are visible.

steps.action: View Test Page One's system-generated URLs
steps.actual: System-generated URLs identified by 'Automatic' in Generated By column: /Test-Page-One (Active 200), /TestPageOne (Redirect 301), /Test-Page-One (Redirect 301)

steps.action: Click on URL column header to sort by path
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted alphabetically by path
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable - no sorting functionality available

steps.action: Click on URL Type column header to sort by status
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted by URL type (Active/Redirect)
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable - no sorting functionality available

steps.action: Click on Generated By column header to sort
steps.expected: URLs should be sorted by generator (Automatic vs user)
steps.actual: Column headers are not clickable - no sorting functionality available

issues: No sorting functionality implemented for URL columns in the page-level URL management UI. Column headers are not interactive.

steps.action: Search for locale filter option in the URL management interface
steps.expected: A filter dropdown or option to filter URLs by locale should be available
steps.actual: No explicit locale filter found in the page-level S.E.O. URL management interface. Locale information is embedded in URL paths (e.g., /en-us/, /es-es/) but not filterable.

steps.action: Use TEST URL tab to verify locale-specific URL generation
steps.expected: URLs should be generated for different locales
steps.actual: TEST URL functionality correctly generates URLs for all configured locales (default, en-us, es-es) but this is for testing purposes, not filtering existing URLs.

issues: No locale filter functionality available in the URL management interface. Locale-specific URLs are displayed inline but cannot be filtered by locale.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View URL details including site alias and query strings

steps.action: View URL details in the S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: URL details should show path, type, and generator
steps.actual: URL details displayed with URL path, URL Type (Active 200 or Redirect 301), and Generated By (Automatic for system-generated, username for custom URLs)

steps.action: Test URL rewriting to view full URL details
steps.expected: URL rewriting should show detailed information including page identification and language
steps.actual: URL Rewriting test shows: Rewriting Result (Default.aspx?TabId=59&language=en-US), Identified Language/Culture (en-US), Identified Page (Test Page One), Redirection Result, and Operation Messages

steps.action: Test URL generation for a page
steps.expected: Generated URLs should include site alias variants
steps.actual: TEST URL functionality shows URLs for multiple locales: http://localhost:8081/my-custom-url-edited, http://localhost:8081/en-us/my-custom-url-edited, http://localhost:8081/es-es/my-custom-url-edited

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify pagination for large URL lists

steps.action: Navigate to a page with multiple URLs (Test Page One has 5 URLs)
steps.expected: Pagination controls should appear if URL count exceeds page size
steps.actual: All 5 URLs displayed in a single list without pagination controls. The URL list shows: /my-custom-url-edited, /Test-Page-One, /old-page-url, /TestPageOne, /Test-Page-One

steps.action: Check for pagination or 'load more' functionality
steps.expected: Pagination or load more button should be available for large lists
steps.actual: No pagination controls visible. All URLs are displayed in a scrollable list.

issues: No pagination functionality observed in the URL list. All URLs are displayed without pagination controls. With only 5 URLs in the test scenario, pagination may not be triggered, but no pagination UI elements were visible.

steps.action: Navigate between different pages and load their URLs
steps.expected: URL lists should load quickly without performance issues
steps.actual: URL lists loaded quickly for all tested pages (Home, Our Products, Test Page One). No noticeable lag or performance issues observed.

steps.action: Test URL generation and rewriting functionality
steps.actual: TEST URL and URL Rewriting operations completed instantly with results displayed immediately.

observations: System-generated URLs are managed at the page level within Pages > Advanced > S.E.O. tab, not as a centralized global list as suggested by the feature description.
System-generated URLs are identified by 'Automatic' in the 'Generated By' column, while custom URLs show the username who created them.
The URL table has three columns: URL (path), URL Type (Active 200 or Redirect 301), and Generated By.
System-generated URLs cannot be edited or deleted - only custom URLs have edit and delete icons.
Column headers are static labels and do not support sorting functionality.
No locale filter dropdown exists in the UI. Locale-specific URLs are shown as separate entries in the URL list with locale prefix in the path.
The TEST URL tab provides comprehensive URL testing including URL generation for multiple locales and URL rewriting validation with detailed operation messages.
The URL Management module under Settings > SEO provides global settings for URL rewriting but the actual per-page URL lists are accessed through Content > Pages.
